body:
Witht he new concretizer i am installing openmpi@4.0.5 with hpl and i get this error.

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/apps/nfs/spack-quanah/bin/spack", line 76, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/opt/apps/nfs/spack-quanah/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 772, in main
    return _invoke_command(command, parser, args, unknown)
  File "/opt/apps/nfs/spack-quanah/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 496, in _invoke_command
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/opt/apps/nfs/spack-quanah/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 406, in install
    install_specs(args, kwargs, zip(abstract_specs, specs))
  File "/opt/apps/nfs/spack-quanah/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 210, in install_specs
    concrete = env.concretize_and_add(abstract, concrete)
  File "/opt/apps/nfs/spack-quanah/lib/spack/spack/environment.py", line 1214, in concretize_and_add
    s for s in self.user_specs if s.satisfies(user_spec)
StopIteration

Any idea of what is causing it?

Thanks
title: hpl install issue
